task.summary: initial commit: - add support for Maven - add support for GWT
create general application layout: ticker (north), chart commands (west), chart (center), trades (east)
aligning UI trades load with Server trades load. There is a slight mis-alignment, but good enough. The ticker is more important than trades

original solution of keeping the trades

add new ChartDemo entry point. This will be used to develop the candlestick chart

working chart - problem with refreshing the chart with additional trades once loaded original ones
working candlestick chart (V1) - some fixes & refactoring
added more time intervals and a possibility to shift the chart
some minor changes to the chart

making the trades component receive market/currency change notifications

added support for the JElastic environment deployment
